mapper.sql: reserve_id, user_id, car_id, room_id, start_time, end_time, create_time, reserve_state, apply_reason, reject_reason
mapper.select: SELECT r.reserve_id,c.car_name,c.car_pic,r.create_time,r.start_time,r.end_time,r.apply_reason,reserve_state FROM car c,reservation r where c.car_id=r.car_id and user_id=#{userId} and reserve_state=#{state};

SELECT e.reserve_id,r.room_name,r.room_pic,e.create_time,e.start_time,e.end_time,e.apply_reason,reserve_state FROM room r,reservation e where r.room_id=e.room_id and user_id=#{userId} and reserve_state=#{state};

SELECT r.reserve_id, r.user_id,u.login_name, c.car_name, c.car_pic, r.create_time, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.apply_reason, r.reserve_state FROM car c, reservation r,user u WHERE c.car_id = r.car_id and u.user_id = r.user_id AND r.reserve_state = #{state}

SELECT e.reserve_id,e.user_id,u.login_name,r.room_name,r.room_pic,e.create_time,e.start_time,e.end_time,e.apply_reason,reserve_state FROM room r,reservation e,user u where r.room_id=e.room_id and u.user_id=e.user_id and reserve_state=#{state}
mapper.insert:
insert into reservation
user_id,
car_id,
room_id,
start_time,
end_time,
create_time,
reserve_state,
apply_reason,
reject_reason,
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{reserveState,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{applyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update reservation
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
reserve_state = #{reserveState,jdbcType=OTHER},
apply_reason = #{applyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reject_reason = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where reserve_id = #{reserveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update reservation set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reserve_state = #{reserveState,jdbcType=OTHER}, apply_reason = #{applyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reject_reason = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where reserve_id = #{reserveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
